cause.description:
Feelings, spirit, identity, relationships............ are all Important ingredients for human development.
We exist in order to provide care for those who need care, belonging for those who need to belong, incentive for those who need incentives, achievement for those who need to achieve.
1. To provide food and clothing for destitute and underprivileged children and senior citizens of all races, colours and creeds.
2. To provide assistance for both Jewish and non-Jewish families who have fallen on hard times.
3. To assist in the promotion of education for underprivileged children and youths at schools, colleges and universities.
4. To participate in the caring of the aged among all population groups.
5. To visit and provide edibles, provisions and stimulation for the institutionalized, sick and incapacitated.
6. To assist in alleviating the plight of those who struggle with HIV / AIDS.
7. To promote goodwill and better understanding between all people of South Africa.
